alert.note: Alert for Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:04PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Columbus and north central Horry Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 403 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clarendon, or 12 miles southwest of Whiteville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tabor City, Loris, Chadbourn, Bethel, Cherry Grove, Mollie, Sidney, Southeastern Community College, Clarendon, Williams, Allsbrook, Green Sea, Brunswick and Loris Community Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
